full_text: Despite increasing security challenges, #Taiwan has worked to maintain peace & stability in the region, while safeguarding our democracy & strengthening resilience. No matter the threats we face, Taiwan will continue to contribute to the world & stand up for democracy. https://t.co/eQ56O0FFrw

Returning to my alma mater LSE, I spoke about how #Taiwan has contributed to secure supply chains & continually enhanced its competitiveness, in spite of the challenges in its way. Today, Taiwan is a critical link in the global economy & a key factor in technological advancement. https://t.co/jXZQDnkgOn

With resilient people & a steadfast commitment to democratic values, Taiwan has shown that democracy can survive & thrive, even in the face of constant threats. We will continue to work with our friends in the international community to ensure that democracy endures.
üé• https://t.co/EB6uuU4wiZ

In this time of global change & uncertainty, one thing remains clear: democracy & resilience are the foundation of a better tomorrow. #Taiwan is proof of this, & we remain unwavering in our commitment to democracy, despite the challenges we face.
üé• Copenhagen Democracy Summit https://t.co/9JZ1YdFHd4

Grateful to @FAPA_HQ for bringing this year's cohort of emerging leaders to #Taiwan to experience our country first hand. It was a pleasure to engage with such an impressive group of young people on pressing global issues & the importance of safeguarding democracy. https://t.co/BoQyzmUkeK

Going back to my alma mater LSE was a very special moment for me. It was a privilege to address students & faculty about changing international dynamics, especially in trade, & how democratic #Taiwan remains globally indispensable in these times of uncertainty. https://t.co/4uIRf1sop9

Speaking at the University of Cambridge, I shared my thoughts on the challenges facing the world & what #Taiwan is doing to strengthen its resilience & safeguard its democracy. I thoroughly enjoyed engaging with students & faculty on these important topics. https://t.co/aM9hxIj9E3
A pleasure to meet with Speaker of the House of Commons @LindsayHoyle_MP. Thank you for inviting me to the @CommonsSpeaker's residence & for being a firm friend to #Taiwan. https://t.co/8xRkOIGE4k

An honour to visit the House of Lords & meet with steadfast friends of #Taiwan from the British parliament. I'm so pleased to be in the #UK celebrating the partnership between our countries - a genuine expression of our shared democratic values. https://t.co/Pcv6DtcPSy

After addressing the Copenhagen Democracy Summit several times virtually, I was delighted to be here in person & to be welcomed by former PM @AndersFoghR Rasmussen. In my speech, I emphasized the importance of resilience in safeguarding democracy in #Taiwan & around the world. https://t.co/hrAUmK7P0G

Today I had the opportunity to visit the #Danish parliament & thank its members, including our long-time friend @Pia_Kjaersgaard, for supporting #Taiwan & our international participation. With all the progress we have made in recent years, I am confident that the partnership https://t.co/V8hRytKwxj

At Vilnius University, I spoke to former Lithuanian President Dalia @Grybauskaite_LT as well as students & faculty. My message: that democracies, big & small, should stand together to defend our values & hard-earned freedoms. https://t.co/nCxsheDgDG

These past two days, I've had the privilege of seeing the sights & learning about the history of Lithuania. I also had the chance to meet with Taiwanese students in Vilnius & bring them a taste of home. Being here to witness the #Taiwan-#Lithuania friendship has been inspiring. https://t.co/kaygbH0ktC

Wonderful to be here in Vilnius sharing a meal & excellent conversation with firm friends & supporters of #Taiwan from the #Lithuanian parliament. I‚Äôm deeply grateful to you all for standing with Taiwan & standing with democracy. https://t.co/eWdIYUWxji

Today I am heading to #Lithuania & #Denmark to meet with friends of #Taiwan & reaffirm our shared commitment to democratic values. During this trip, I hope to strengthen Taiwan‚Äôs relationships in Europe & encourage a deeper understanding of Taiwan globally. https://t.co/kYOy0jlzgG

I extend my heartfelt condolences to the Catholic communities in Taiwan and around the world on the loss of Pope Francis. His profound messages of peace and universal love resonated deeply with me and will live on through us all.

Taiwan's own Nymphia Wind @66wind99, looking incredible as always. I love seeing you share #Taiwan with the world, this time with some of our most emblematic wildlife like the Mikado pheasant and clouded leopard on your dress.
https://t.co/T6xHmKJn36

Former US Deputy Secretary of State Richard Armitage was a man of principle and a true friend of Taiwan. While he will be greatly missed, he will also be remembered for his commitment to democracy and for building bridges between democratic partners around the world. https://t.co/mk81JJVOpy
My heart goes out to everyone affected by the earthquake that struck Myanmar and Thailand today. I sincerely hope that the rescue and recovery efforts can help all those in need.
